/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky above is hazy, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. In the distance, a blue car can be seen, adding a pop of color to the otherwise muted palette of the image.
